did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: U.S. Anthracite Coal Commission Publications, 1920-1923
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection consists of publications either produced by the Commission or submitted to the Commission.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: United States. National Bituminous Coal Commission

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: U.S. Anthracite Coal Commission Publications #5389. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p:
Related Collections:
5502 mf: John Mitchell Papers on Microfilm
5583/1: Archives Organization File (AOF) Part 1
5583/2: Archives Organization File (AOF) Part 2
5619: ACWA Records
5897 mf: Strike Files of the U.S. Department of Justice, Pt. 1 on Microfilm
5956: Archives Organization File Additional records
6034: Rare Pamphlet Collection
6046: Archives Union File (AUF)
